p: At the final day of experiment to determine the therapeutic response of plant extract, rats of each group were weighed to evaluate the change in body weight. Gain in body weight (grams) was evaluated by subtracting the pre-clinical trial body weight from post-clinical trial body weight of each group. For the determination of selected antioxidant and biochemical parameters heart puncture technique after 42 days was performed to collect blood samples. Serum from non-anti-coagulated blood was separated after centrifugation and frozen at -20 Â°C until analysis.
